targets.rawSql: SELECT COUNT(value) AS '好' from 'aqi_2018' WHERE  value < 51 AND province="$province2" AND city="$city2"
SELECT COUNT(value) AS '中等' from 'aqi_2018' WHERE value < 101 AND value > 50 AND province="$province2" AND city="$city2"
SELECT COUNT(value) AS '不适于敏感人群' from 'aqi_2018' WHERE value < 151 AND value > 100 AND province="$province2" AND city="$city2"
SELECT COUNT(value) AS '不健康' from 'aqi_2018'  WHERE value < 201 AND value > 150 AND province="$province2" AND city="$city2"
SELECT COUNT(value) AS '非常不健康' from 'aqi_2018'  WHERE value < 301 AND value > 200 AND province="$province2" AND city="$city2"
SELECT COUNT(value) AS '危险' from 'aqi_2018'  WHERE value > 300 AND province="$province2" AND city="$city2"

  AND city = "$city"

panels.title: 城市宜出行月份排行(空气质量)

targets.rawSql: SELECT province, city, COUNT(value) as '适宜温度' FROM 'temp' WHERE value > 14 AND value <26 AND t > 1514736000000 AND t < 1546271999000 GROUP BY province, city ORDER BY 适宜温度 DESC LIMIT 20

panels.title: 宜居城市排行(适宜温度天数)

targets.rawSql: SELECT COUNT(value) AS '好', province, city from 'aqi' WHERE  value < 51 GROUP BY province, city ORDER BY 好 DESC LIMIT 20

panels.title: 宜居城市排行(空气质量好天数)

targets.rawSql:
SELECT
  COUNT(value) as '1月适宜温度天数',
  province,
  city
FROM
  'temp'
WHERE
  t > 1514736000000
  AND t < 1517414399000
  AND value > 14
  AND value < 26
GROUP BY
  province,
  city
ORDER BY
  1月适宜温度天数 DESC
LIMIT
  20

  7月适宜温度天数 DESC
LIMIT
  20

SELECT
  COUNT(value) as '7月适宜温度天数',
  province,
  city
FROM
  'temp'
WHERE
  t > 1541001600000
  AND t < 1543593599000
  AND value > 14
  AND value < 26
GROUP BY
  province,
  city
ORDER BY
  7月适宜温度天数 DESC
LIMIT
  20
